name: Valerio Lombardi
membership: I'm signed in Ordine Ingegneri della Provincia di Roma since June 2004 and now I'm president of Healthcare Information System Commission.
goal:
I'm an Electronic Engineer. My work is on eHealth Technologies and Processes, with focus on innovations introductions in the organizations life. The aspects covered on the activities start from the people organization, the technologies used and the final management control to have the best financial result with the best care for the patients.
Since 2013, when I begun president of the European Engineers Commission by the Order of Engineers of Rome Province, I work on EU programs, specially on Professional mobility and title recognitions. In 2017, I begun president of the Healthcare Information Systems Commission by Order of Engineers of Rome Province, where I work on EU eHealth programs and Italian Healthcare system.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: I follow the works of the Directorateâ€‘General for Communications Networks, Content and Technology, specially the eHealth guideline and publications.
